name: Recharge Innate Magic
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Advanced Race Guide © 2012, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: You channel magic energy into your own aura, recharging your innate magic abilities. You regain one use of all 0-level and 1st-level spell-like abilities you can use as a result of a racial trait.
text_zh: 你将魔法能量引导至自身体内，填充你内在的魔法能力。所有你能够使用并且通过种族特性获得的0环以及1环类法术能力全部重新获得1次使用机会。
